name: Anteaters in Tutus
description:
CHAOTIC MULTIPLAYER OPERA INFILTRATION

Your dream was to become an opera singer. You are a talented being, a beautiful creature who would command the stage, oh but if only you weren't an anteater...

Fear not! There is always a way. With a brilliant disguise, you will take the stage and show everyone who the top tutu-wearing anteater is! Anteaters in Tutus is a two-four player competition where each player must play a series of notes that correspond to a controller button. The longer the song goes on, the longer the list of buttons become, and you better not run out of time or else your true anteater identity will be discovered!

Features:

  • 5 Zany Anteaters
  • 4 Wild Stages
  • 2-4 Players
  • Nutty Anteater Singing

THIS GAME REQUIRES A CONTROLLER
If you're having trouble getting your controller to work (or want to emulate one with your keyboard), try using x360ce
A game by Great Sky Whale Games
